p: The active dichloromethane fraction of root was subjected to column chromatography over silica gel and Sephadex LH-20. As the result, four known coumarins namely, bergapten ( 1) [ 17], imperatorin ( 2) [ 17], pimpinellin ( 3) [ 22] and umbelliferone ( 4) [ 17] ( Figure 1) were isolated and identified in several places before it says these were isolated from the rootsâ€”explain.
